title: Fix that bug Rito!
body:
So we just had a disruption in the match between FNC and EDG, and what caused it?
The long known bug with Q for Gragas/Vi and other champs with similar abilities.

Will Riot finally fix this bug since it just disrupted a tournament game?
I've lost many a game because of this bug hitting me, and the only way I've found to fix it is to Task Manager out of LoL and relaunch.

FIX THIS FUCKING BUG!

replies.body:
Serves them right. If they know about a bug but refuse to fix it then it should ruin one of the largest LOL related events of the year.

Unfortunately this will never happen with Quinn...

Happen with what?
I don't recognize that name...
The gragas bug isn't the same as the vi bug.

Sorry i didn't see that match, what is this bug and what did it do? i haven't encountered it.

theres a couple of bugs id also like to see in worlds because that way riot is kinda obliged to fix them once they are publicly shown to the world.
Reignover on gragas, used q and bugged out and couldnt use q ever again in that match so they had to re do the match.
Ahh ok, well thats awkward for riot if they knew about it already and didn't fix it.

It's a bug that's existed for about three seasons now.
It happens to any champ that has a Q that is a charge up ability like Vi and Xerath, if while charging the ability up you get CCed or interrupted you wont be able to use Q anymore.

Usually there are two ways to fix it, die a couple of times, or restart your client fully.
Yeah it is, hence why in OP I said it's cost me a fair few games.
I feel for you man :/ i havent had it myself, but this needs to be fixed....
It does, and until now Riot's response to this bug has pretty much been "shit happens".
